messages.body: $ALXN this will have a bidding war. PT $200 per share

$BCRX $SPY  
My target $15-20 by April.  $30-50 by end of 2021.  JMP Investor CC this 12/15 to get more corporate overview. 
  
1) FDA approved for HAE ($485k per year per patient) recently. 
2) 350m funding done. 
3) Japan decision on Orladeyo w/ 20m payment.  Dec/2020  
4) Galidesevir (Covid data).  Dec/2020  
5) FOP data (ultra rare disease).  Dec/2020  
6) JPM CC on Jan/2021 (you never know some deals might happen)  
7) PNH data 1st Q/2021 (the big one now that we got FDA approved)  
8) 4th Q and yearly report on Feb/2021  
9) EU decision on Orladeyo (March/April 2021)  
10) 1st Q results on 5/2021 (we'll see how the launch went on Orladeyo)  
11) Phase 2 start for PNH (factor D) and FOP, along with many phase 1 Factor D on new indications.  Results from phase 2 sometimes in 2022 will determine if we go $100+.   
  
Rare disease companies almost always goes up once they start selling their drugs.  Look at $ALXN on their charts since approval.  Now it is bought by $AZN
